attributes.action: intervene and stop Russell Davies casting Catherine Tate as the role of assistant in the forthcoming series of 'Doctor Who'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Perhaps the most popular, highly regarded and most exported show the BBC make is about to be ruined. Catherine Tate is the most annoying actress/'comedienne' on British TV, and we the undersigned do not want her ANYWHERE near our show again. Save the Doctor. Bring Martha back permanently.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
